entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Snow level 2000 metres rising to 2600 metres this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Snow level 2500 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning and 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 2600 metres in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
